Features 

Definitive creative inspiration 

Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD Production Suite has everything you need to make films in HD quality professional. Users can edit video in nearly any format including HDV and AVCHD video and create stunning 3D using stereoscopic 3D's innovative tools.

Choose from hundreds of video effects, titles and filters professional 2D and 3D. The unique quick-start tutorials will help you become familiar with the program right away. 



Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD 11 

Software Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD lets you create movies 11 spectacular in nearly any format. The powerful tools in 3D stereoscopic video compositing, color correction and surround sound mixing help you achieve feature-film results in your home studio. You can also customize your movies with text animations, lists of titles and scrolling credits. 



DVD Architect Studio 5

The Sound Forge Audio Studio 10 includes the Vocal Eraser plug to easily remove vocals from most recordings. You can also use this plugin to remove vocals from songs for remixing and creating custom karaoke tracks.

DVD Architect Studio 5 includes 12 new DVD themes are a great addition to the package of issues. These funds contain pre-produced exciting menus and buttons that can be used in any project DVD or Blu-ray.

Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD Production Suite 11 includes an interesting group of audio effects and video clips from NewBlue, one of the leading designers of audio and video plugins. Once installed, the tools are available directly from the windows of effects of Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD 11, a seamless editing experience without leaving the application. These additional transitions and effects offer more options for improving audio and video projects with professional polish. 



DVD Quick Start Tutorial 

The DVD included quick-start tutorial provides a quick overview of the program Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD 11. This DVD tutorial is basic workflows effectively required to edit audio and video projects quickly from start to final delivery. The topics of the tutorial also includes some advanced sections that explain how that professional touch, and technical chroma and color correction. 



400 exclusive soundtracks 

Vegas Movie Studio Platinum HD Production Suite includes 400 exclusive music soundtracks. This collection of royalty-free music produced with professional quality provides the perfect touch to your project.
